intro: Orthosia stannardii, commonly known as the Stannard's orthosia, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is native to the mountainous regions of Central Asia, particularly in countries like Kazakhstan and Uzbekistan. The plant is characterized by its slender, erect stems and small, white to greenish-yellow flowers arranged in umbels. Its leaves are finely divided and resemble those of other members of the carrot family. Orthosia stannardii is often found in dry, rocky habitats and is adapted to thrive in arid conditions.
